Class MenuBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • MenuBuilder
  • public class MenuBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Java CLI-MenuBuilder A Java Class that automatically generates a Command Line Menu using Java Figlet(jfiglet) by lalyos https://github.com/lalyos/jfiglet

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.lang.Exception

      • BuildMenu

        public static java.lang.String BuildMenu​(java.lang.String Text,
                                         java.lang.String[] menuEntries,
                                         java.lang.String fontname,
                                         int borderGapBannerX,
                                         int borderGapBannerY,
                                         int borderGapMenuX,
                                         int borderGapMenuY,
                                         int MenuTextGap)
                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Parameters:
        Text - The Bannertext
        menuEntries - Array with the submenu entries (leave this empty if you dont want to display a submenu)
        fontname - name of the font (*.flf)
        borderGapBannerX - Gap between Border and Banner (X)
        borderGapBannerY - Gap between Border and Banner (Y)
        borderGapMenuX - Gap between Border and Menu (X)
        borderGapMenuY - Gap between Border and Menu (Y)
        MenuTextGap - Gap between Menu entries
        Returns:
        String with the whole Menu
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Exception
